SEARCH
Package entities

Class ClientInfo

java.lang.Object
entities.ClientInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ClientInfo extends Object implements Serializable
The ClientInfo class represents information about a client, including its host name, IP address, and status. This class implements the Serializable interface, allowing it to be serialized for storage or transmission.
Version:
August 2024
Author:
Kfir Amoyal, Israel Ohayon, Yaniv Shatil, Noam Furman, Omri Heit, Eitan Zerbel
See Also:
